{"step_by_step_thinking": "The master apical file is the file used for the final preparation of the apical part of the root canal. It is typically the last file used before obturation. It is not the initial file used for determining the working length or the smaller file used in between other files during preparation. It is also not used for the removal of soft debris from the root canal. Therefore, the correct answer is A. The last file which is selected for the obturation.", "answer_choice": "A"}
